transcript: I can't believe you. I can't believe it. Well I'm gonna be there. I'll be at that wedding but I'll be in the back.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I can't believe you.  I can't believe it.  Well I'm going to be there.  I'll be at that wedding but I'll be in the back.
